item.title: ubuntu 解决语言设置错误的问题
item.description: 在使用 ubuntu 命令行登录的时候，出现： 1 2 3 4 5 6 7 8 perl: warning: Setting locale failed. perl: warning: Please check that your locale settings: LANGUAGE = (unset), LC_ALL = (unset), LC_MESSAGES = "zh_CN.UTF-8", LANG = "zh_CN.UTF-8" are supported and installed on your system. perl: warning: Falling back to the standard locale ("C"). 这样的错误
